game.name: Jan 4x4
game.tomove: Move any piece of your color to a horizontally or vertically adjacent grid intersection.
game.towin: Align three of your pieces in a row.

strategy.name: Perfect Play
strategy.description: Move one of your most outside pieces to the middle rows, then mirror the same move with your opposite inside piece (you now have two in a row). Move alternate outside piece up and down (stalemate).
